item.description:
We'll meet at the Sandwich Mt. Trail parking lot on Route 49(0.4 miles southwest of Tripoli Road) and hike up to Jennings Peak. After enjoying the views from the ledges, we'll continue on to Sandwich Dome. We'll return by Drakes Brook Trail.
Winter gear and foot traction are required. No cotton clothing.
This is an intermediate level hike.
2600 foot elevation gain.
8.3 miles
6 hours 45 minute book time.

Everybody is invited back after wards to the "Inn at Lincoln" to swim and use the sauna and hot tub
item.how_to_find_us: blue Subaru Outback, bike racks on the roof
item.name: Jennings Peak and Sandwich Dome
